participant_1.background:
I'm a great storyteller, and I use that to make friends and get to know my family.
I'm curious about the relationship between humans and animals, and how we can better understand each other.
i am looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
i was born in france and moved to canada.
my favorite drink is iced coffee.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to talk about how we can make the world a more joyful place.
I'm proud of the love and care I give to my family and pets.
i am male.
i go to a local college.
I checked my pulse multiple times a day to make sure I'm not dying.

content.text: I am a great storyteller! It's a great way to get to know people.
What kind of stories do you like to tell?
I love telling stories about human-animal relationships! I'm curious about how we can better understand each other.
That's a great topic! I'm also interested in how we can make the world a more joyful place.
That's awesome! I agree, it's so important to make the most of life.
Yes! I have a dog and a cat. They're my best friends.
That's great! I have two dogs. They're my whole world.
I love dogs! They're the best.
I agree! They're so loving and loyal.
What's your favorite thing to do with your pets?
I love playing with them and taking them for walks. They always make me laugh.
Me too! They're so funny and entertaining.
I'm glad we have something in common. I think pets are the best.
I agree! They make life so much better
